personalInfo.residence: Dallas, TX; plays out of Prestonwood CC

tourBios.otherInfo: Member of the BUY.COM TOUR in 1996 and 1998-99...tied for first round lead at the 1999 Utah Classic after shooting a 66, never fell farther than 2nd place the entire tournament...was one shot off the lead after 36 holes at the 1999 Shreveport Open...recorded five top-10 finishes in 1998, four in the month of August...best finish of the season came at the 1998 Ozarks Classic, started the final round two-strokes behind the leader and fired a 70 to finish third...has played in only two PGA TOUR events, the 1995 Sprint International and the LaCantera Texas Open...posted three top-10 finishes in seven events on the 1997 Southern Africa Tour, with his best finishes being ties for fifth in the FNB Players Championship and Alfred Dunhill PGA Championship...All-America selection while at Texas A&M.

dyn.dynResults: His best finish on the Web.com Tour was T2nd in 1999 at the NIKE Utah Classic.
